"InkTyme": A printer that learns your printing habits and suggests ink cartridges to purchase based on your usage patterns.
"PaperMate": A printer that helps you organize your paper documents and digital files.
"PrinterPal": A printer that connects to your smart home devices for a seamless printing experience.
"ColorFusion": A printer that combines multiple printing technologies for vibrant, high-quality prints.
"PrinterPulse": A printer that uses AI to optimize its performance and reduce waste.
